kv20.5:1.3: Nanu aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
kv20.5:1.6: Hañci aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
kv20.5:1.7: sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.5:5.1: ☑ Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.3: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.5: sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.10: sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:6.2: sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:6.4: sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:9.4: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hoti;
kv20.5:9.5: evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
kv20.5:10.4: “yasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati.
kv20.5:10.5: Yasmiñca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi …pe… tatiyopi …pe… catutthopi tattha samaṇo upalabbhati.
kv20.5:10.6: Imasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati. Idheva, subhadda, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo. Suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
